content: this is a summary of a legal case in which one party referred to as gd is seeking a divorce from the other party referred to as ed the court issued a final resolution referred to as court dec and ordered gd to cover the procedural costs the case lasted for four months the republic of estonia represented by sion filed a resolution to dismiss gds action for divorce the parties have reached a compromise agreement regarding the division of their common property with one party becoming the sole owner of an apartment and the other party receiving financial compensation the payment of the compensation is postponed and changes will be made to the land register to reflect the new ownership arrangement the court approves the compromise agreement terminates the proceedings and explains the consequences and obligations of the parties the judgment regarding the divorce can be appealed within a certain timeframe the court also determines the distribution of procedural costs and mentions the possibility of refunding the state fee paid for the proceedings the progress of the case is summarized by a judge named xxxxxxxxxx who refers to specific articles of the legal code
